The SacramentoSan Joaquin River Delta, or California Delta, is an expansive 
inland river delta and estuary in Northern California. The Delta is formed at the 
western edge of the Central Valley by the confluence of the Sacramento and San 
Joaquin rivers and lies just east of where the rivers enter Suisun Bay. ... The
